definition: make an uncontrolled, short, jerky motion

sememes.reasoning: The verb describes the body part undergoing a change in its spatial state, moving from one position to another.

participants.reasoning: The '(body part)' specified in the frame is the entity that undergoes the motion, not an agent performing the action volitionally.

The definition explicitly describes the motion as 'short', indicating its brief temporal extent.
